description:
When the wind is tossing ice crystals right down the gulley where you're anchored to the belay, the Patagonia Fitz Roy offers reliable and efficient warmth. The fill is high loft traceable down, ethically-sourced and third-party certified to be non-live plucked and supplied from a facility that does not practice force feeding. The wind and water-resistant Pertex® Quantum shell has you covered if the weather turns, and it all packs away into its own pocket for convenient storage.

  • Shell is lightweight, durable Pertex® Quantum recycled nylon with a DWR finish to keep it water-resistant
  • 10-denier NetPlus® lining is ultralight, packable nylon ripstop that’s made from recycled fishing nets
  • Insulated with high-loft premium 800-fill-power goose down
  • Baffled construction and large lofted chambers to pack in warmth
  • Helmet-compatible, adjustable hood has an internal heat-locking draft collar
  • 2 handwarmer pockets hand and external chest pockets for easy access while belaying
  • Internal drop in stretch pocket holds gloves or skins
  • Elasticized, low-profile cuffs can be pulled over gloves or pushed up out of the way
  • Soft, elasticized cuffs can be pulled over gloves and the cord-lock hem seals out drafts
name: Patagonia Fitz Roy Down Hoody - Men's
